verses.verse: וַיְהִי֩ <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> the word יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֜י <WH413> about בַּשָּׁנָ֤ה <WH8141> year הַתְּשִׁיעִית֙ <WH8671> Again in the ninth בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הָעֲשִׂירִ֔י <WH6224> in the tenth בֶּעָשׂ֥וֹר <WH6218> in the tenth לַחֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH2320> [day] of the month לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> of man [כְּתֹוב־ כ] (כְּתָב־ <WH3789> write לְךָ֙ <WH3789> write ק) אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> thee the name הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> of the day אֶת־ <WH853> עֶ֖צֶם <WH6106> [even] of this same הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this סָמַ֤ךְ <WH5564> set מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king בָּבֶל֙ <WH894> of Babylon אֶל־ <WH413> to יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> himself against Jerusalem בְּעֶ֖צֶם <WH6106> this same הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וּמְשֹׁ֤ל <WH4911> And utter אֶל־ <WH413> about בֵּית־ <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֙רִי֙ <WH4805> unto the rebellious מָשָׁ֔ל <WH4912> a parable וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> and say אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> to כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD שְׁפֹ֤ת <WH8239> Set on הַסִּיר֙ <WH5518> a pot שְׁפֹ֔ת <WH8239> set [it] on וְגַם־ <WH1571> and also יְצֹ֥ק <WH3332> and also pour בּ֖וֹ מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> water

אֱסֹ֤ף <WH622> Gather נְתָחֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5409> the pieces אֵלֶ֔יהָ <WH413> about כָּל־ <WH3605> Every נֵ֥תַח <WH5409> piece ט֖וֹב <WH2896> thereof into it [even] every good יָרֵ֣ךְ <WH3409> the thigh וְכָתֵ֑ף <WH3802> and the shoulder מִבְחַ֥ר <WH4005> [it] with the choice עֲצָמִ֖ים <WH6106> bones מַלֵּֽא׃ <WH4390> fill

מִבְחַ֤ר <WH4005> the choice הַצֹּאן֙ <WH6629> of the flock לָק֔וֹחַ <WH3947> Take וְגַ֛ם <WH1571> and also דּ֥וּר <WH1754> and burn הָעֲצָמִ֖ים <WH6106> also the bones תַּחְתֶּ֑יהָ <WH8478> under רַתַּ֣ח <WH7571> well רְתָחֶ֔יהָ <WH7570> under it [and] make it boil גַּם־ <WH1571> Also בָּשְׁל֥וּ <WH1310> and let them seethe עֲצָמֶ֖יהָ <WH6106> the bones בְּתוֹכָֽהּ׃ <WH8432> of it therein ס

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <WH559> Wherefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהֹוִ֗ה <WH3069> GOD אוֹי֮ <WH188> Woe עִ֣יר <WH5892> city הַדָּמִים֒ <WH1818> to the bloody סִ֚יר <WH5518> to the pot אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which חֶלְאָתָ֣ה <WH2457> whose scum בָ֔הּ וְחֶ֨לְאָתָ֔הּ <WH2457> [is] therein and whose scum לֹ֥א <WH3808> Without יָצְאָ֖ה <WH3318> is not gone out מִמֶּ֑נָּה <WH4480> of it לִנְתָחֶ֤יהָ <WH5409> piece לִנְתָחֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5409> by piece הוֹצִיאָ֔הּ <WH3318> of it bring it out לֹא־ <WH3808> Without נָפַ֥ל <WH5307> fall עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> and גּוֹרָֽל׃ <WH1486> let no lot

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For דָמָהּ֙ <WH1818> For her blood בְּתוֹכָ֣הּ <WH8432> is in the midst הָיָ֔ה <WH1961> become עַל־ <WH5921> on צְחִ֥יחַ <WH6706> it upon the top סֶ֖לַע <WH5553> of a rock שָׂמָ֑תְהוּ <WH7760> of her she set לֹ֤א <WH3808> did not שְׁפָכַ֙תְהוּ֙ <WH8210> she poured עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> it not upon the ground לְכַסּ֥וֹת <WH3680> to cover עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> with עָפָֽר׃ <WH6083> it with dust

לְהַעֲל֤וֹת <WH5927> to come up חֵמָה֙ <WH2534> That it might cause fury לִנְקֹ֣ם <WH5358> to take נָקָ֔ם <WH5359> vengeance נָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> I have set אֶת־ <WH853> דָּמָ֖הּ <WH1818> her blood עַל־ <WH5921> on צְחִ֣יחַ <WH6706> upon the top סָ֑לַע <WH5553> of a rock לְבִלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> that it הִכָּסֽוֹת׃ <WH3680> that it should not be covered פ

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3068> GOD א֖וֹי <WH188> Woe עִ֣יר <WH5892> city הַדָּמִ֑ים <WH1818> to the bloody גַּם־ <WH1571> also אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I אַגְדִּ֥יל <WH1431> for fire great הַמְּדוּרָֽה׃ <WH4071> I will even make the pile

הַרְבֵּ֤ה <WH7235> Heap הָעֵצִים֙ <WH6086> on wood הַדְלֵ֣ק <WH1814> kindle הָאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> the fire הָתֵ֖ם <WH8552> consume הַבָּשָׂ֑ר <WH1320> the flesh וְהַרְקַח֙ <WH7543> and spice הַמֶּרְקָחָ֔ה <WH4841> it well וְהָעֲצָמ֖וֹת <WH6106> and let the bones יֵחָֽרוּ׃ <WH2787> be burned

וְהַעֲמִידֶ֥הָ <WH5975> Then set עַל־ <WH5921> on גֶּחָלֶ֖יהָ <WH1513> upon the coals רֵקָ֑ה <WH7386> it empty לְמַ֨עַן <WH4616> So תֵּחַ֜ם <WH3179> of it may be hot וְחָ֣רָה <WH2787> and may burn נְחֻשְׁתָּ֗הּ <WH5178> thereof that the brass וְנִתְּכָ֤ה <WH5413> of it may be molten בְתוֹכָהּ֙ <WH8432> in it טֻמְאָתָ֔הּ <WH2932> and [that] the filthiness תִּתֻּ֖ם <WH8552> of it may be consumed חֶלְאָתָֽהּ׃ <WH2457> [that] the scum

תְּאֻנִ֖ים <WH8383> [herself] with lies הֶלְאָ֑ת <WH3811> She hath wearied וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> has not תֵצֵ֤א <WH3318> went not forth מִמֶּ֙נָּה֙ <WH4480> Yet רַבַּ֣ת <WH7227> and her great חֶלְאָתָ֔הּ <WH2457> scum בְּאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> [shall be] in the fire חֶלְאָתָֽהּ׃ <WH2457> out of her her scum

בְּטֻמְאָתֵ֖ךְ <WH2932> In thy filthiness זִמָּ֑ה <WH2154> [is] lewdness יַ֤עַן <WH3282> Because טִֽהַרְתִּיךְ֙ <WH2891> because I have purged וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> are not טָהַ֔רְתְּ <WH2891> thee and thou wast not purged מִטֻּמְאָתֵךְ֙ <WH2932> from thy filthiness לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תִטְהֲרִי־ <WH2891> thou shalt not be purged ע֔וֹד <WH5750> again עַד־ <WH5704> Until הֲנִיחִ֥י <WH5117> to rest אֶת־ <WH853> חֲמָתִ֖י <WH2534> any more till I have caused my fury בָּֽךְ׃

אֲנִ֨י <WH589> I יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> I the LORD דִּבַּ֙רְתִּי֙ <WH1696> have spoken בָּאָ֣ה <WH935> [it] it shall come to pass וְעָשִׂ֔יתִי <WH6213> and I will do לֹֽא־ <WH3808> I will not אֶפְרַ֥ע <WH6544> [it] I will not go back וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and I will not אָח֖וּס <WH2347> neither will I spare וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and I אֶנָּחֵ֑ם <WH5162> neither will I repent כִּדְרָכַ֤יִךְ <WH1870> according to thy ways וְכַעֲלִילוֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH5949> and according to thy doings שְׁפָט֔וּךְ <WH8199> shall they judge נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> thee saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהֹוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD פ
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> Also the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> of man הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> I am about לֹקֵ֧חַ <WH3947> behold I take away מִמְּךָ֛ <WH4480> at אֶת־ <WH853> מַחְמַ֥ד <WH4261> from thee the desire עֵינֶ֖יךָ <WH5869> of thine eyes בְּמַגֵּפָ֑ה <WH4046> with a stroke וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> shall not תִסְפֹּד֙ <WH5594> yet neither shalt thou mourn וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תִבְכֶּ֔ה <WH1058> nor weep וְל֥וֹא <WH3808> shall not תָב֖וֹא <WH935> run down דִּמְעָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH1832> neither shall thy tears

הֵאָנֵ֣ק ׀ <WH602> to cry דֹּ֗ם <WH1826> Forbear מֵתִים֙ <WH4191> for the dead אֵ֣בֶל <WH60> no mourning לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no תַֽעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> make פְאֵֽרְךָ֙ <WH6287> the tire of thine head חֲב֣וֹשׁ <WH2280> bind עָלֶ֔יךָ <WH5921> and וּנְעָלֶ֖יךָ <WH5275> thy shoes תָּשִׂ֣ים <WH7760> upon thee and put on בְּרַגְלֶ֑יךָ <WH7272> upon thy feet וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> no תַעְטֶה֙ <WH5844> and cover עַל־ <WH5921> and שָׂפָ֔ם <WH8222> not [thy] lips וְלֶ֥חֶם <WH3899> not the bread אֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH376> of men לֹ֥א <WH3808> no תֹאכֵֽל׃ <WH398> and eat

וָאֲדַבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> So I spake אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָם֙ <WH5971> unto the people בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וַתָּ֥מָת <WH4191> died אִשְׁתִּ֖י <WH802> my wife בָּעָ֑רֶב <WH6153> and at even וָאַ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> and I did בַּבֹּ֖קֶר <WH1242> in the morning כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> I צֻוֵּֽיתִי׃ <WH6680> as I was commanded

וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <WH559> said אֵלַ֖י <WH413> about הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> And the people הֲלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not תַגִּ֥יד <WH5046> unto me Wilt thou not tell לָ֙נוּ֙ מָה־ <WH4100> what אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> these לָּ֔נוּ כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you עֹשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> us what these [things are] to us that thou doest
וָאֹמַ֖ר <WH559> Then I answered אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH413> to דְּבַ֨ר־ <WH1697> them The word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> came אֵלַ֖י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

אֱמֹ֣ר ׀ <WH559> Speak לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֮ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3069> GOD הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> I am about מְחַלֵּ֤ל <WH2490> Behold I will profane אֶת־ <WH853> מִקְדָּשִׁי֙ <WH4720> my sanctuary גְּא֣וֹן <WH1347> the excellency עֻזְּכֶ֔ם <WH5797> of your strength מַחְמַ֥ד <WH4261> the desire עֵֽינֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5869> of your eyes וּמַחְמַ֣ל <WH4263> pitieth נַפְשְׁכֶ֑ם <WH5315> and that which your soul וּבְנֵיכֶ֧ם <WH1121> and your sons וּבְנֽוֹתֵיכֶ֛ם <WH1323> and your daughters אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom עֲזַבְתֶּ֖ם <WH5800> whom ye have left בַּחֶ֥רֶב <WH2719> by the sword יִפֹּֽלוּ׃ <WH5307> shall fall

וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <WH6213> And ye shall do כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> I עָשִׂ֑יתִי <WH6213> as I have done עַל־ <WH5921> and שָׂפָם֙ <WH8222> [your] lips לֹ֣א <WH3808> you will not תַעְט֔וּ <WH5844> ye shall not cover וְלֶ֥חֶם <WH3899> the bread אֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH376> of men לֹ֥א <WH3808> and you will not תֹאכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> nor eat

וּפְאֵרֵכֶ֣ם <WH6287> And your tires עַל־ <WH5921> will be on רָאשֵׁיכֶ֗ם <WH7218> [shall be] upon your heads וְנַֽעֲלֵיכֶם֙ <WH5275> and your shoes בְּרַגְלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH7272> upon your feet לֹ֥א <WH3808> You will not תִסְפְּד֖וּ <WH5594> ye shall not mourn וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and you will not תִבְכּ֑וּ <WH1058> nor weep וּנְמַקֹּתֶם֙ <WH4743> but ye shall pine away בַּעֲוֹנֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5771> for your iniquities וּנְהַמְתֶּ֖ם <WH5098> and mourn אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> one אֶל־ <WH413> about אָחִֽיו׃ <WH251> toward another

וְהָיָ֨ה <WH1961> Thus יְחֶזְקֵ֤אל <WH3168> Thus Ezekiel לָכֶם֙ לְמוֹפֵ֔ת <WH4159> is unto you a sign כְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> he עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> according to all that he hath done תַּעֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> shall ye do בְּבֹאָ֕הּ <WH935> and when this cometh וִֽידַעְתֶּ֕ם <WH3045> ye shall know כִּ֥י <WH3588> that אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I am אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> that I [am] the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD ס

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you בֶן־ <WH1121> Also thou son אָדָ֔ם <WH120> of man הֲל֗וֹא <WH3808> will not be on בְּי֨וֹם <WH3117> [shall it] not [be] in the day קַחְתִּ֤י <WH3947> when I take מֵהֶם֙ <WH1992> like אֶת־ <WH853> מָ֣עוּזָּ֔ם <WH4581> from them their strength מְשׂ֖וֹשׂ <WH4885> the joy תִּפְאַרְתָּ֑ם <WH8597> of their glory אֶת־ <WH853> מַחְמַ֤ד <WH4261> the desire עֵֽינֵיהֶם֙ <WH5869> of their eyes וְאֶת־ <WH853> מַשָּׂ֣א <WH4853> and that whereupon they set נַפְשָׁ֔ם <WH5315> their minds בְּנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1121> their sons וּבְנוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH1323> and their daughters

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> in that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he יָב֥וֹא <WH935> shall come הַפָּלִ֖יט <WH6412> [That] he that escapeth אֵלֶ֑יךָ <WH413> to you לְהַשְׁמָע֖וּת <WH2045> unto thee to cause [thee] to hear אָזְנָֽיִם׃ <WH241> that

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he יִפָּ֤תַח <WH6605> be opened פִּ֙יךָ֙ <WH6310> shall thy mouth אֶת־ <WH853> הַפָּלִ֔יט <WH6412> to him which is escaped וּתְדַבֵּ֕ר <WH1696> and thou shalt speak וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> no תֵֽאָלֵ֖ם <WH481> and be no more dumb ע֑וֹד <WH5750> longer וְהָיִ֤יתָ <WH1961> become לָהֶם֙ לְמוֹפֵ֔ת <WH4159> and thou shalt be a sign וְיָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> unto them and they shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD ס
